function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Panic buying of essential goods leading to scarcity and price increases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Violence and altercations in retail spaces due to panic buying","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Medical and psychological maladies due to stress and isolation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Panic buying and hoarding during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Maladaptive behaviors driven by fear and anticipatory anxiety","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious behavior of panic buying influenced by others","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rejection of behavioral change message and pandemic threat","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of false or misleading information about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Violent reactions in public spaces to compliance with guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Consumers avoiding medical offices and using telemedicine and home delivery","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consumers not adhering to expert-recommended behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Market segment with low perception of threat and defensive avoidance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of effective communication during a health crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective safety campaigns against distracted driving","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misperception of pandemic threat and self-efficacy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived threat influencing protective or defensive motivations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maladaptive approaches due to low perceived efficacy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited response to fear appeals in diverse research contexts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived susceptibility and perceived severity of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maladaptive consumer behaviors exhibited by survivalists and rejectionists","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Panic buying as a maladaptive response to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in responses to pandemic based on theoretical constructs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with government guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying and stockpiling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Belief that the threat is highly exaggerated","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empathy and understanding for consumer stress and uncertainty during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uniform approach to consumers during the pandemic, neglecting the wisdom of market segmentation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Employees facing financial insecurity due to covid-19 impacting employment and housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emotional health and well-being of employees at risk due to social distancing and isolation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift in priorities from esteem and self-actualization to meeting basic needs during high-stress situations like the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Workforce and workplace health and safety protocols not being followed","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance to regulatory and health protection agencies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsafe onsite living environment and medical assistance","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Organizations unable to meet the basic physiological needs of their workforce, including health and safety, job security, and financial stress.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of motivation and recognition due to focus on basic physiological needs.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Team members’ health is a priority","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on day-to-day operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about specific roles and responsibilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate time management and organization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited knowledge sharing and interaction between colleagues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-person gatherings for learning sessions and webinars can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission among employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staff turnover reduction and engagement initiatives may lead to complacency in following health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Travel initiatives, such as sending employees back to their own country, may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper health and safety measures are not implemented during travel.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of recognition and appreciation in the workplace may lead to decreased motivation and job satisfaction.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate training and knowledge sharing may lead to a lack of preparedness for handling contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication and engagement initiatives may lead to emotional repercussions and anxiety among employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restriction of team building and group engagement activities due to social distancing norms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Offsite employees unable to express and share their stories and experiences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited communication from leadership due to remote work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
